last_phrase: In summary, this extensive training covers various techniques and methods for hypnotherapy, such as using sounds, breathing, nonverbal codes, and hypnodrama to induce a hypnotic state in clients. There are demonstrations for different types of hypnosis, such as animal hypnosis and self-hypnosis for weight loss, and how to work on different physiological systems in the body. Furthermore, the course teaches about magnetism and how it can be used to heal different organs in the body and can be adapted to different types of personalities. The importance of verbal suggestion and confident, positive communication is also emphasized to become a successful hypnotist.
